result.title: Help! Divide and Conquer Algorithm for Computing General Linear Recurrence???
result.content:
Hallo, everyone.

Can you please help me with the following problem?

If a[n] = b[k] * a[n-k] for k = 1..n, then the generating function A(x) = a[0] / (1 â€” B(x)) We can compute all a[n] with Divide and Conquer algorithm in O(nlog^2(n)). What is that Divide and Conquer algorithm?

I have the feeling that it is strongly related to FFT but that's just my feeling. Can someone give me the exact algorithm?

Thank you
